item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: What We Do With Your Data Nothing. Seriously. We track visitors to the website for ad purposes but do not store any other user data.

item.title: A Random Walk with FIRE
item.description: What is FIRE? FIRE stands for Financial Independence Retire Early and is a personal finance philosophy focused on living below your means, investing aggressively when you're young, reaping the benefits of compound interest, and living off the gains well before typical retirement years.
